title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\Cve
name: Cve
description:
CVE stands for Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures.

More information: https://cve.mitre.org

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.Cve

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.id
params.description: The unique identifier for the vulnerability. e.g. CVE-2021-34527

params.name: data.cvssv3
params.description: Describe Common Vulnerability Scoring System specified at https://www.first.org/cvss/v3.1/specification-document

params.name: data.upstream_fix_available
params.description: Whether upstream fix is available for the CVE.
